attributes.action: Reduce university fees for distance learning, especially because of covid.
attributes.additional_details: Government should step in and force universities to reduce fees and refund those that have already paid. Its unfair to pay substantial fees when you cannot get the full university experience and access to resources and face to face contact.
attributes.background: Reduce course fees for taught based undergraduate and postgraduate degrees where people have been forced to do distance learning because of covid. They cannot visit university and use resources. People should pay reduced amount because they are getting a reduced package.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

You might also like to know the Petitions Committee held a debate in Parliament on tuition fees on Monday 16th November. You can watch the debate back and find out more about the Committee's work on this issue on our website:
https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/123538/mps-to-debate-petitions-relating-to-university-tuition-fees/
